title: Leavebuster.
body: Hello Riot, I'm here to rant about the new leave buster system. I admit i have left the game in the past and got a 20 minute leave buster but recently I was hit by another 20 minute leave buster from my laptop overheating and being absolutely unable to connect to the internet. I feel like the leave buster system should reset after finishing a 20 queue. Every time i get a new leave buster, it starts at 20 minutes again. So please Riot, a deduction on these timers would be really nice. All though I am very open to read points against my current argument.

replies.body:
So I'm gonna agree with you, due to me getting the 20 minute leavebuster too. Riot OCE , PLEASE can't you make this system a little more efficient?? I feel like I've been slamdunked for reasons - months old - that most likely were leaves out of absolute nicesity <-- hate this word. I do have a child and sometimes he still wakes up at midnight but i dont do this frequently enough to deserve 5 games of this!! I play alot, cant you balance the system somehow, bearing in mind that some of us actually love yer game? </3 

I'd love if someone could get a hold of me in-game to chat about this for my circumstances

Thanks kindly :(
